languages.text: "Хорошо, раз вы настаиваете, я подумаю еще раз... Вино разило брагой, прятки были покушением — ничего веселого в этом нет, прочие увеселения отдавали упадочностью и скудоумием. Вроде все".

"Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо, раз вы настаиваете, я подумаю еще раз... Вино разило брагой, прятки были покушением — ничего веселого в этом нет, прочие увеселения отдавали упадочностью и скудоумием. Вроде все".

traits.locale_text: "Very well. If you insist, let me think one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there, and the rest of the festivities had all the symptoms of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

"Very well. If you insist, let me think one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there, and the rest of the festivities had all the symptoms of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

"Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like bilge water, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

"Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like bilge water, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

"Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

"Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

languages.text: 「いいでしょう。そこまで言うなら、もう一度思い返してみます…ワインは洗濯水のような臭いがしたし、『偽者探し』は出来レースでした。魅力的な要素は一つも見当たりません。それに、他の催しもすべて堕落の典型のようなものでした。これで、言うべきことはすべて言いました」
languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

traits.locale_text: 「いいでしょう。そこまで言うなら、もう一度思い返してみます…ワインは洗濯水のような臭いがしたし、『偽者探し』は出来レースでした。魅力的な要素は一つも見当たりません。それに、他の催しもすべて堕落の典型のようなものでした。これで、言うべきことはすべて言いました」

languages.text: "Also schön, wenn Ihr darauf besteht, will ich noch einmal darüber nachdenken ... Der Wein schmeckte wie Abwaschwasser, die Jagd auf den Hochstapler war ein Trick – daran ist ist absolut nichts Ansprechenden –, und der Rest der Festivitäten wies alle Merkmale fortgeschrittenen Verfalls auf. Ich glaube, das war's."
languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

traits.locale_text: "Also schön, wenn Ihr darauf besteht, will ich noch einmal darüber nachdenken ... Der Wein schmeckte wie Abwaschwasser, die Jagd auf den Hochstapler war ein Trick – daran ist ist absolut nichts Ansprechenden –, und der Rest der Festivitäten wies alle Merkmale fortgeschrittenen Verfalls auf. Ich glaube, das war's."

languages.text: « Puisque vous insistez, laissez-moi y réfléchir une seconde fois... Le vin était aigre, la chasse aux imposteurs était truquée, donc sans intérêt, et le reste de la fête n'était qu'une succession de scènes toutes plus décadentes les unes que les autres. Je crois que j'ai tout résumé. »
languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous insistez, laissez-moi y réfléchir une seconde fois... Le vin était aigre, la chasse aux imposteurs était truquée, donc sans intérêt, et le reste de la fête n'était qu'une succession de scènes toutes plus décadentes les unes que les autres. Je crois que j'ai tout résumé. »

languages.text: «Muy bien, si insiste, deje que me lo piense una vez más... El vino olía a agua de fregar, la Caza del Impostor fue una encerrona sin ningún tipo de interés, y el resto de las festividades presentaban todas las características de la degradación humana. Creo que eso lo resume todo».
languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien, si insiste, deje que me lo piense una vez más... El vino olía a agua de fregar, la Caza del Impostor fue una encerrona sin ningún tipo de interés, y el resto de las festividades presentaban todas las características de la degradación humana. Creo que eso lo resume todo».

languages.text: “好吧，既然你这么坚持，那我就再回忆一下吧……那里的酒尝起来有股刷锅水的味道，狩猎冒牌货的活动是个阴谋，而其他的庆祝活动不过是堕落的行为罢了。我想不到任何吸引我的地方，我相信这个答案已经很完整了。”
languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，既然你这么坚持，那我就再回忆一下吧……那里的酒尝起来有股刷锅水的味道，狩猎冒牌货的活动是个阴谋，而其他的庆祝活动不过是堕落的行为罢了。我想不到任何吸引我的地方，我相信这个答案已经很完整了。”

languages.text: "Pekâlâ, bir daha düşüneyim... Şarap, bulaşık suyu gibiydi. Taklitçi Avı düzmeceydi. İlgimi çeken tek bir şey yoktu. Bir de şenliklerin geri kalanı yozlaşmadan geçilmiyordu. Sanırım bu kadarı yeterli."
languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ, madem ısrar ediyorsun, bir daha düşüneyim... Şarap bulaşık suyu gibiydi. Taklitçi Avı düzmeceydi. İlgimi çeken tek bir şey yoktu. Bir de şenliklerin geri kalanı yozlaşmadan geçilmiyordu. Sanırım bu kadarı yeterli."

languages.original_text: "Very well, if you insist, let me think about it one more time... The wine smelled like wash, the Impostor Hunt was a plot — I fail to see anything appealing there — and the rest of the festivities had all the characteristics of degradation. I believe that covers everything."
